name: dead sticks
description:
dead sticks

Click on the top of the stick to get started.

'dead sticks' is an abstract and minimalistic puzzle game with physics based on verlet integration.

Play the fullscreen browser window version here.

'dead sticks' comes from 'dead stick landing' which means landing an aircraft when the engine broke down.

At the moment i am making a longer version, that will be released on ios and android.

Follow Supernapie on twitter to keep up with the news.

If you want to play more games like this one, visit supernapie.com
